ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 24
ygData.msgSnippet: This is odd, as I actually remember being told that Druids were one of the most worthless classes and were only good for traveling.  *grin* I have no idea.  I
ygData.messageBody:
This is odd, as I actually remember being told that Druids were one of
the most worthless classes and were only good for traveling. *grin*

I have no idea. I do know they get some pretty nifty illusion
spells. I've see one as a (very big) tree, and one as a wolf. If anything
else, that's pretty darn cool.

'Course, if we ever make it up there, we get to turn into a
skeleton. Gee, I bet the guards _really_ love us then. :-) Actually, I
wont be surprised to see my Charisma drop down to 1 upon casting that spell,
but boy am I going to have fun drompting about the world in the form of a
skeleton.

That brings something else up, too. Does anybody know if we _ever_
get to summon anything besides a plain'ol boring looking yellow skeleton?
I mean, they have skins for Zombies, Ghouls, and differant sized skeletons
that I've seen thus far, and I've seen more than one skin for a Zombie. Why
couldn't they make the Necromancer spells summon a differant undead? Sure,
maybe not a Ghoul -- at least not until almost or at level 50 -- but
something else other than a skel, please! :-)

Maybe if we used differant spell components. After all, the
elemental pets for the Magi all look differant, and all have their own
reagents. Then again, each has its own spell, too. *big sigh*

I dunno. Maybe in some future update. :-)

~Mysk

P.S. The Necro in the Qeynos guild _does_ say that he turned Drosco
into a zombie to roam the sewers...... who knows, maybe at a higher level,
or one we research....or maybe not.

> From: Juan Custer <JuanC@...>
>
>
> What exactly is it with Druids? I never really see anything but the
> receiving end, so I'm not sure what's the big deal. Are their spells
> overpowered? Do they have awesome abilities? What exactly is up with
this
> class that makes them shooting stars to the upper levels?
>
> Malark on Karana
